post:
One Step Hosting Ltd is pleased to launch our new VPS brand: BUYVPS (www.buyvps.co.uk) .

Our new VPS plans hosted in brand new servers at a premium datacenter with excellent connectivity.

Payments methods accepted: Debit/Credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay

Features:

Node specs:
Brand new HP Gen9 Enterprise Servers
Intel E5 v4 processors
DDR4 ECC RAM
Intel Datacenter SSD series storage
Hardware RAID-10 with 4GB flash cache!
10Gbit network ports
Low latency


VPS Plan Features:
30-Day Money Back Guarantee
24/7 UK Based Technical Support
Daily Backups
Dedicated Memory and Storage
Root acccess
KVM hypervisor
FREE setup

Location: London, UK (USA coming soon)
Datacenter: Telehouse North, London, UK(Telehouse North has been the primary home of the London Internet Exchange (LINX)
since 1994 and continues to be one of the most heavily connected data centres in the world,
also hosting LONAP and all major carriers on site.)

Tier1 Transit : Comcast, NTT Communications, China Telecom, Telia Sonera, Telecom Italia.
Private Peering : Deutsche Telekom AG, Telefonica, France Telecom (Orange), Hibernia, Liberty Global (UPC).
Public Peering : Equinix-IX, DE-CIX Frankfurt, AMS-IX Amsterdam, Balcan-IX(Romtelecom), Interlan, NET-IX, LINX.


SAVE!
